description:
Oslo's version.py which Nova uses requires openstack.common.setup which isn't included with Nova at the moment.

This should be added to openstack-common.conf and copied into the Nova repo.
title: Need to include setup.py from Oslo

comments.content:
Oslo's version.py which Nova uses requires openstack.common.setup which isn't included with Nova at the moment.

This should be added to openstack-common.conf and copied into the Nova repo.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rconradharris

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/28812
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Patch was abandoned.  Nova is using pbr now and the oslo version module isn't in openstack-common.conf on master:

http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/tree/openstack-common.conf
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem
